blocks.text: Add points for each descriptor to determine Bone-RADS score level.
Bone-RADS score = sum of all points above.

items: Score margins (IA/IB/II/IIIA-C), periosteal reaction, endosteal erosion.
Add modifiers: pathologic fracture (+2), soft tissue mass (+4), known primary cancer (+2).
Apply management: surveillance vs advanced imaging vs biopsy/ortho oncology.

blocks.text: Score each feature -> add modifiers -> sum points -> assign Bone-RADS 0-4 -> follow management.
